core.corner_pickers module¶

class core.corner_pickers.CornerPicker(corners: list[core.watermarking.Corner], max_width_proportion: float, max_height_proportion: float)¶

Bases: ABC

An object that picks the best corner of an image to place a watermark “best” is determined by implementation’s spec

abstract pick_best_corner(image: <module 'PIL.Image' from 'C:\\Users\\mikol\\Repos\\addWatermarks\\venv\\lib\\site-packages\\PIL\\Image.py'>) → Corner¶

Picks the best corner of an image to place a watermark

Parameters:

image – image to choose a corner from

Returns:

best corner chosen according to implementation’s spec, (UPPER_LEFT, UPPER_RIGHT, LOWER_LEFT, LOWER_RIGHT)

core.watermarking.add_watermark(image: <module 'PIL.Image' from 'C:\\Users\\mikol\\Repos\\addWatermarks\\venv\\lib\\site-packages\\PIL\\Image.py'>, corner: ~core.watermarking.Corner, watermark: <module 'PIL.Image' from 'C:\\Users\\mikol\\Repos\\addWatermarks\\venv\\lib\\site-packages\\PIL\\Image.py'>, max_width_proportion: float, max_height_proportion: float, opacity: float) → <module 'PIL.Image' from 'C:\\Users\\mikol\\Repos\\addWatermarks\\venv\\lib\\site-packages\\PIL\\Image.py'>¶

Returns a new image with watermark added in specified corner

Parameters:

  • image – original image

  • corner – corner where watermark is added

  • watermark – watermark to add

  • max_width_proportion – [0, 1] maximum watermark / image width ratio

  • max_height_proportion – [0, 1] maximum watermark / image height ratio

  • opacity – opacity of the watermark

Returns:

new image with watermark
